comment.body:
`cdn.stroeerdigitalgroup.de/metatag/live/` looks like ads/tracking script using in many German sites: https://publicwww.com/websites/%22cdn.stroeerdigitalgroup.de%2Fmetatag%22+depth%3Aall ?

Website: https://www.stroeer.de/werben-mit-stroeer/onlinewerbung/

I have checked and didn't see obvious breakages on some sites, but I'm not totally sure. It's also used as cookie notice script in some sites like https://www.bergfex.com/ but I don't see breakages when blocking it.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.iqiyi.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2F) ### Comment > 在https://www.iqiyi.com/封面右键元素里找到播放链接，如果AdGuard开启下面2项功就算把问题域名设为白名单世 > 不能解决问题 > 1,【"AdGuard URL跟踪过滤器 > 通过从URL中删除跟踪参数来增强隐私的过滤器。” > 2."Legitimate URL Shortener > 自动从URL中删除不必要的"$'和'&'值，使它们更容易从URL栏中复制并作为链接 > 粘贴到其他地方。已包含在Dandelion Sprout的防骚扰列表中。】" > 会导致爱奇艺视频网站不能正常打开。关闭AdGuārd打开元素里面复制的链接就正 > 常打开 > 这是我最喜欢的2个功希望能修复规则，同时网站也是最知名的视频网站 > > > > Find the playback link in the element.If AdGuard enables the > following two functions,even if the problem domain is > whitelisted,it cannot solve the problem > 1.AdGuard URL Tracking Filter > A privacy enhancing filter that removes tracking parameters > from URLs > 2.Legal URL Shorter > Automatically remove unnecessary '$and'&'values from > URLs,making them easier to copy from the URL bar and > paste as links elsewhere.Already included in Dandelion > Sprout's anti harassment list > It will cause the iQiyi video website to not open properly. > Close AdGuard and open the copied link in the element to > open it normally > These are my favorite 2 features that I hope can fix the rules. > and the website is also the most well-known video website ### Screenshots

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: Added

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> [@Alex-302](https://github.com/Alex-302) Hmm... Somehow the rule `laposte.net$$script:contains(html-load.com)` does not apply on Firefox?
> 
> I think scriptlet cannot inject on time in Firefox, how about using `replace`?
> 
> ||laposte.net^$document,replace=/<script>\(function\(\)\{function[^\n]+html-load\.com[^\n]+?<\/script>//
> [@AdamWr](https://github.com/AdamWr) Sorry, can you check this, is `replace` good for performance?

I think that this `$replace` rule is good.

<hr>

Regarding `$$` rules. These rules are disabled for Firefox extension (if I'm not wrong, it has been disabled few years ago - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersCompiler/commit/3135f239cf35eee21611fcbf52cbbb0cc32ef27e#diff-38e9218f396ef1cf16171a0d41333e7069a7fa5afaf8bfdad64523b59e0798f2R115 and it seems that it's still disabled - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersCompiler/blob/master/src/main/platforms-config.js#L657) one of the related issues - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2826

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
Niestety rozszerzenie MV3 nie może aktualizować filtrów, więc nowe reguły będą dostępne dopiero w jednej z kolejnych wersji rozszerzenia.

Do tego czasu dodaj proszę poniższą regułę do reguł użytkownika:

```adblock
open.fm#%#(()=>{Object.defineProperty=new Proxy(Object.defineProperty,{apply:(e,t,n)=>{const r=new Set(["VP","w3","JW"]),o=n[1],c=n[2]?.get;return o&&r.has(o)&&"function"==typeof c&&c.toString().includes("()=>i")&&(n[2].get=function(){return function(){return!1}}),Reflect.apply(e,t,n)}});})();
```

<hr>

Swoją drogą, jeśli problem występuje nawet z wyłączonym AdGuardem (tak to wygląda na zrzucie ekranu), to najprawdopodobniej jest spowodowany czymś innym (może innym rozszerzeniem albo blokowanie reklam na poziomie DNS).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

issue.title: www.malaymail.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: Add `Title: [Filter List Name]` to all existing filter lists
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer; - [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed; - [x] This is not an ad/bug report. ### Problem description Due to this:
Screenshot

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1e91eaad-4444-48a4-ad89-93c560b9296c)

-------- Also this: * `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersRegistry/master/filters/filter_3_Spyware/filter.txt` - `! Title: AdGuard CNAME disguised mail_trackers list` The existing 'Title:' line in the filter list should be replaced and this one should be added to the top of the filter list lines: `! Title: AdGuard Tracking Protection filter` ### Proposed solution For example: `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersRegistry/master/filters/filter_2_Base/filter.txt` ``` ! Homepage: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardFilters ! License: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/LICENSE ! Title: AdGuard Base Filter ``` ### Additional information _No response_

comment.body:
If the browser's built-in (I don't know if it's an Opera/Vivaldi panel or an experimental one in Brave) function does not have a feature such as `replace` support, then perhaps such links will be better:

* https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/chromium/filters/3.txt
 
* https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/opera/filters/3.txt

* https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/edge/filters/3.txt

Unfortunately, there are two titles there and if the program chooses the last one, the CNAME section import needs to be corrected (I don't think they'll follow uBo's example of checking the only first 2048 characters for a valid title/homepage).

The second drawback may certainly be the day of the death of the list generation strictly under Chromium MV2 with permanent delete support these URI-s - people from the "set and forget" group will generate network traffic and without a browser message about the deleted list without filtering websites (old add-ons maybe AdGuard will freeze with own json mechanism to reduce this traffic on your part).

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only these filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Widgets
```

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [http://realmadryt.pl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Frealmadryt.pl) ### Comment > 1. Open realmadryt.pl with AdGuard enables on Android device > 2. Open any article on the page - everything except picture will be blocked with information about AdBlock detected. > 3. If you disable AdGuard and refresh the page content will get unlocked. > > Sometimes if you enable subpage on new tab and open it instantly then AdGuard is not detected and ads get blocked but this happens in about 10% cases.
